question.content: There will be a meeting for anyone interested in learning about the new building plans at 5 p.m.
The purchase of a third photocopier has improved efficiency by ……….reducing time wasted waiting in line.
If they renew the account, that company ……….handling their accounts for over fifteen years.
Revenue for the current financial year is expected to ……….last year’s profits by as much as 7%.
Despite the introduction of paternity leave for new fathers, very few men are ……….to take advantage of the system.
The holiday shopping season has begun and ……….one thing is clear: people are not spending as much as in past years.
If you’ve ever dreamed about ……….around the world, this may be the cruise for you.
This year, for the first ………., all new model cars are required to have front seat airbags.
UDA Airway will no longer participate in joint mileage programs with credit card companies, ………. January 2006.
Overall, vacations in the US are expected to ………. a modest 3% more this year, compared to last.
